entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
